title: Customer Service Excellence
description: Advanced techniques for delivering outstanding customer experiences in gig work

vocabulary.context: Star ratings critical for gig workers

phrases.english: How can I make your experience better?
I want to ensure you're completely satisfied
phrases.spanish: Quiero asegurarme de que esté completamente satisfecho
phrases.pronunciation: kee-EH-roh ah-seh-goo-RAR-meh deh keh es-TEH kom-pleh-tah-MEN-teh sah-tees-FEH-choh

phrases.english: Would you like me to adjust anything?

culturalNotes.note: US customers expect friendly, attentive service but respect personal space
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Less physically affectionate than Colombian service culture (no hugs/kisses)

culturalNotes.note: Tips are expected in US gig economy - good service typically earns 15-20% tips
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More structured tipping than in Colombia; directly impacts earnings

culturalNotes.note: Brief, friendly conversation is welcome, but read customer cues - some prefer quiet
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Less chatty than typical Colombian social interactions

practicalScenarios.situation: Customer seems unhappy but hasn't said anything
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: ¿Todo está bien? ¿Hay algo que pueda mejorar para usted?
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: Is everything okay? Is there anything I can improve for you?
practicalScenarios.tips: Proactively address issues before they become complaints

practicalScenarios.situation: Receiving a compliment from a customer
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Muchísimas gracias. Su satisfacción es muy importante para mí.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: Thank you very much. Your satisfaction is very important to me.
practicalScenarios.tips: Accept graciously and reinforce your commitment to service

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Si quedó satisfecho con el servicio, una buena calificación me ayuda mucho.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: If you were satisfied with the service, a good rating helps me a lot.
practicalScenarios.tips: It's appropriate to politely ask for ratings if service went well
